subject: Deaths (Obituaries)
Basketball (College)
lead_paragraph: Mr. Guthridge spent three decades as an assistant to Dean Smith before taking over the basketball team from 1997 to 2000 and reaching two Final Fours.
snippet: Mr. Guthridge spent three decades as an assistant to Dean Smith before taking over the basketball team from 1997 to 2000 and reaching two Final Fours.
